FuncDef: This command configures an explicit path between this T-PE and a remote T-PE. For each path, one or more intermediate S-PE hops must be configured. A path can be used by multiple multi-segment pseudowires. Paths are used by a 7450 ESS, 7750 SR, or 7950 XRS T-PE to populate the list of Explicit Route TLVs included in the signaling of a dynamic MS-PW.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a locally-unique case-sensitive alphanumeric name label for the MS-PW path of up to 32 characters in length.
